description: Introductory quiz on Mobius covering first 3 weeks' material with multiple-choice/short answer questions requiring R computations. Multiple attempts allowed in Week 4.
50-minute online test in Week 7 covering weeks 1-5 probability material with 4-5 questions. Conducted under exam conditions with mark feedback.
2-hour exam during official university examination period assessing problem-solving skills and understanding of all course topics from lectures/tutorials.
